{
  "presetId": 112,
  "title": "API StyleGuide",
  "productGroups": [
    {
      "styleguideSubcategoryId": 1,
      "styleguideCategoryId": 1,
      "quantity": 1,
      "serviceType": 1,
      "productGroupType": 2,
      "isShinyReflective": true,
      "isNotStand": true,
      "comment": "API Test comment ",
      "backgroundAttachmentId": "{{Att_id_1}}",
      "makeupAttachmentId": "{{Att_id_2}}",
      "photoAngleTypes": [
        1
      ],
      "attachmentIds": [
        "{{Att_id_1}} ",
        "{{Att_id_2}}"
      ],
      "jsonParameters": {
        "background": 1,
        "makeupType": 1,
        "modelPositions": [
           1
        ],
        "faceModel": 1,
        "makeup": 1,
        "makeupHair": 1,
        "providedModel": 1,
        "modelType": 1,
        "age": 18,
        "shoesSize": 3,
        "modelsQuantity": 1,
        "shootPlace": 1,
        "comment": "API Test comment - 2"
      }
    }
  ]
}
